title: STARTER DECK DAWN OF THE XYZ

card.name: Spirit of the Harp
card.description: A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.

card.name: Luster Dragon #2
card.description: This dragon feeds on emerald. Enchanted by this monster even when attacked, few people live to tell of its beauty.

card.name: Dark Blade
card.description: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

card.name: Gene-Warped Warwolf
card.description: This warwolf was given incalculable strength through horrific genetic manipulation. Its gentle nature was completely wiped out, and it now lives only to unleash destruction.

card.name: Zubaba Knight
card.description: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-up Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster.

card.name: Ganbara Knight
card.description: When this face-up Attack Position card is targeted for an attack: You can change it to Defense Position.

card.name: Feedback Warrior
card.description: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; it becomes Level 3.

card.name: Speed Bird
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can target 2 Level 2 monsters in your Graveyard; Special Summon them, but their effects are negated.

card.name: Key Man the Key Warrior
card.description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can make this card Level 3 until the End Phase.

card.name: Tenshin
card.description: This card gains 400 ATK for each face-up Level 2 monster you control.

card.name: Shine Knight
card.description: This card is Level 4 while in face-up Defense Position.

card.name: Giant Rat
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in Attack Position.

card.name: Shining Angel
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

card.name: Blade Knight
card.description: Gains 400 ATK while you have 1 or less cards in your hand. If you control no other monsters, the effects of Flip monsters destroyed by battle with this card are negated.

card.name: Marauding Captain
card.description: Your opponent cannot target Warrior monsters for attacks, except this one. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

card.name: Majestic Mech - Senku
card.description: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Draw 1 card. During the End Phase of the turn this card was Summoned: Send it to the Graveyard.

card.name: Vengeful Shinobi
card.description: When this face-up Attack Position card is targeted for an attack: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Field-Commander Rahz
card.description: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Choose 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior-Type monster from your Deck, except "Field-Commander Rahz", and place it on top of your Deck.

card.name: Trident Warrior
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 monster from your hand.

card.name: Warrior Lady of the Wasteland
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH Warrior-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

card.name: Blustering Winds
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK and DEF until your next Standby Phase.

card.name: Harmonic Waves
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it becomes Level 4 until the End Phase.

card.name: Xyz Energy
card.description: Detach 1 Xyz Material you control to target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Fissure
card.description: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

card.name: Swords of Revealing Light
card.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but you must destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

card.name: The Warrior Returning Alive
card.description: Target 1 Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Banner of Courage
card.description: All monsters you control gain 200 ATK during your Battle Phase only.

card.name: Poison of the Old Man
card.description: Activate 1 of these effects;●Gain 1200 LP.●Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Lucky Iron Axe
card.description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. If this face-up card you control is destroyed by your opponent's card effect and sent to your Graveyard: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Reinforced Space
card.description: Each face-up Xyz Monster you control gains 300 ATK for each Xyz Material attached to it, until the End Phase.

card.name: Xyz Effect
card.description: When you Xyz Summon a monster: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Dust Tornado
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

card.name: Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
card.description: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Mirror Force
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

card.name: Raigeki Break
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Shield Spear
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 400 ATK and DEF until the End Phase.

card.name: Limit Reverse
card.description: Target 1 monster with 1000 or less ATK in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in Attack Position. If the target is changed to Defense Position, destroy it and this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy the target. When the target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Reinforce Truth
card.description: Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Warrior-Type monster from your Deck. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Number 39: Utopia
card.description: 2 Level 4 monstersWhen a monster declares an attack: You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the attack. If this card is targeted for an attack, while it has no material: Destroy this card.

card.name: Gachi Gachi Gantetsu
card.description: 2 Level 2 monstersIf this face-up card would be destroyed, you can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card instead. Face-up monsters you control gain 200 ATK and DEF for each Xyz Material attached to this card.

card.name: Grenosaurus
card.description: 2 Level 3 monstersWhen this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
